mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.office_id AS "office.id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.provence AS "provence", a.city AS "city", a.district AS "district", a.office_introduction AS "officeIntroduction", a.office_link AS "officeLink", a.name AS "name", a.short_name AS "shortName", a.office_type AS "officeType", a.image AS "image", a.file AS "file", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", o2.name AS "office.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_office o2 ON o2.id = a.office_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_office_information( id, office_id, name, short_name, office_type, image, file, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, user_id, provence, city, district, office_introduction, office_link ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{office.id}, #{name}, #{shortName}, #{officeType}, #{image}, #{file}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{user.id}, #{provence}, #{city}, #{district}, #{officeIntroduction}, #{officeLink} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_office_information SET office_id = #{office.id}, name = #{name}, short_name = #{shortName}, office_type = #{officeType}, image = #{image}, file = #{file}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, user_id = #{user.id}, provence = #{provence}, city = #{city}, district = #{district}, office_introduction = #{officeIntroduction}, office_link = #{officeLink} WHERE id = #{id}
